column4: Helpers i have installed windows xp and linux,and now when i do restart or maybe coz i have upgrade to 9.04 i cant see windows xp just ubuntu,anyone plz ?
did you use Wubi?
no i installed windows xp and then linux without any program
I think ubottu might have a link to this one, one sec
you might have overwritten XP with Ubuntu on accident...
also i am trying to install vmware workstation and it shows me a message that cannot be intalled when kvm enabled
I don't use vmware, I have no idea how to help on that one, but I can tell you how to know if XP is still installed or if you accidentally overwrote it
no coz i work about one week windows xp and linux
ok :)
use Add/Remove programs (in your menu on the upper right) to install Partition Editor
i open add/remove but i cant see about the partition?
Add/Remove is just to install the program to let you see the partitions, you need to search for Partition and install Partition editor, check the box next to it and hit Apply
it says there is no matching partition available
better idea, open a terminal (Applications->Accessories->Terminal) and type the following into it: sudo apt-get install gparted
ok i installed it from add/remove
ok, open it, in System->Administration->Partition Editor
how can i know if windows xp still or not?
i cant see windows xp,
then somehow it got deleted probably, are there only two partitions?
there are many, i show you the screenshot on pm
my battery is dying, I've only got about 10 minutes left
